burnLiquidity(address).notice: BURN LIQUIDITY WITHOUT ROUTER EXERCISE  The contract has an initial balance of 0.01 UNI-V2-LP tokens.  Burn a position (remove liquidity) from USDC/ETH pool to this contract.  The challenge is to use the `burn` function in the pool contract to remove all the liquidity from the pool.
